results.title: Effect of anti-hyperglycemic drugs on endoplasmic reticulum (ER) stress in human coronary artery endothelial cells.
results.text_hl: Seven classes of anti-@<m>DISEASE_Ototoxicity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081015 @@@hyperglycemic drugs@@@ were screened including @CHEMICAL_Sulfonylurea_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013453 @@@sulfonylureas@@@, @CHEMICAL_meglitinide @CHEMICAL_MESH:C030516 @@@meglitinides@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, alpha glucosidase inhibitors, @CHEMICAL_2_4_thiazolidinedione @CHEMICAL_MESH:C089946 @@@thiazolidinedione@@@, @GENE_GLP1R @GENE_2740 @@@glucagon like peptide 1 (GLP-1) receptor@@@ agonists and @GENE_SLC5A2 @GENE_6524 @@@sodium-glucose cotransporter 2@@@ (@GENE_SLC5A2 @GENE_6524 @@@SGLT-2@@@) inhibitors.

results.title: Metformin: update on mechanisms of action on liver diseases
results.text_hl: Moreover, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ protects against chemical-induced and @DISEASE_Chemical_and_Drug_Induced_Liver_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D056486 @@@drug-induced liver injury@@@ (@DISEASE_Chemical_and_Drug_Induced_Liver_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D056486 @@@DILI@@@) against @<m>DISEASE_Ototoxicity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081015 @@@hepatotoxic drugs@@@.

results.title: Metformin promotes Mycobacterium tuberculosis killing and increases the production of human beta-defensins in lung epithelial cells and macrophages.
results.text_hl: In the present study, we aimed to determine the role of anti-@<m>DISEASE_Ototoxicity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081015 @@@hyperglycemic drugs@@@ such as @CHEMICAL_Glyburide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005905 @@@glyburide@@@, @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ to promote the killing of mycobacteria through the regulation of innate immune molecules such as host defense peptides (HDP) in lung epithelial cells and macrophages.

results.title: Metformin alleviates glucolipotoxicity-induced pancreatic beta cell ferroptosis through regulation of the GPX4/ACSL4 axis.
results.text_hl: However, the role of glucolipotoxicity in inducing beta cell ferroptosis remains unclear. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@), @CHEMICAL_Exenatide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077270 @@@exenatide@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Exenatide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077270 @@@Exe@@@), and @CHEMICAL_saxagliptin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C502994 @@@saxagliptin@@@ (@CHEMICAL_saxagliptin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C502994 @@@Sax@@@) are frequently used @<m>DISEASE_Ototoxicity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081015 @@@anti-hyperglycaemic drugs@@@.

results.title: Sodium-glucose co-transporter-2 inhibitors vs metformin in reducing osteoarthritis risk: a retrospective cohort study of health insurance claims and check-up data.
results.text_hl: We aimed to compare the incidence of @DISEASE_Osteoarthritis @DISEASE_MESH:D010003 @@@osteoarthritis@@@ between individuals receiving @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, the most common anti-@<m>DISEASE_Ototoxicity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081015 @@@hyperglycemic drug@@@, and sodium-glucose co-transporter-2 inhibitors (SGLT-2is).

results.title: Implementation and assessment of a novel drug interaction tool (TLC-act) in an entry-to-practice doctor of pharmacy program.
results.text_hl: Students were instructed to view all five videos and then complete a patient case that focused on the @<m>DISEASE_Ototoxicity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081015 @@@DDI@@@ between @CHEMICAL_Ciprofloxacin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002939 @@@ciprofloxacin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

results.title: Successful rescue of a rare case of refractory shock due to multidrug toxicity: a case report.
results.text_hl: Conclusion: The treatment of mixed @<m>DISEASE_Ototoxicity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081015 @@@drug poisoning@@@ involving @CHEMICAL_Reserpine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012110 @@@reserpine@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ is very challenging.

results.title: Cytokine Storm and Failed Resolution in COVID-19: Taking a Cue from Multiple Sclerosis.
results.text_hl: Also, reports suggest a better outcome in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with reasonable glycemic control, which certainly hints towards a hidden role of anti-@<m>DISEASE_Ototoxicity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081015 @@@hyperglycemic drugs@@@ such as @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in alleviating disease pathology through its anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ feature.
